long_description: CamelBak Antidote Insulated Drinking Tube integrates with your compatible CamelBak Quick Link(TM) reservoir to offer thermal protection of your beverage in hot and cold conditions. Includes 39 in. delivery tube, insulated cover, Ergo HydroLock(TM), Big Bite(TM) Valve and Quick Link(TM) connector.
short_description: CamelBak Antidote Insulated Drinking Tube integrates with your compatible CamelBak Quick Link(TM) reservoir to offer thermal protection of your beverage in hot and cold conditions.
